item.title: Optimising the navigation on the Co-op website
item.description: Project background After about 18 months at Co-op, mainly working on our Experience Library design system, I joined the team who look after our main website, coop.co.uk. The team’s mission was to “direct high-quality traffic to our food stores and online journeys to drive growth of our Co-op” The team was funded as a ‘run’ team, and was composed of several software and platform engineers working diligently to keep Co-op’s many web services running.
